arts.ttl: Andrej Kramarić double secures crucial win for Hoffenheim against Mainz
arts.sum: Hoffenheim secured a welcome 2-0 win against Mainz with Andrej Kramarić scoring both goals. Hoffenheim entered the match desperate to end their four-game winless streak, while Mainz were looking to continue their strong season performance.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga matchday 29 afternoon round-up: Bayer Leverkusen lose ground, Hoffenheim win big, and late goals galore
arts.sum: It was an action-packed afternoon of Bundesliga football on matchday 29. Here is your round-up of all afternoon games from this matchday. Hoffenheim Should Be Safe Hoffenheim captain Andrej Kramarić…

arts.ttl: Kramaric's brace lifts Hoffenheim to important win over Mainz
arts.sum: Mainz's Champions League hopes were dealt a blow as they went down 2-0 to Hoffenheim, who won thanks to an Andrej Kramaric brace.

arts.ttl: Burkardt misses Mainz's clash with Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Jonathan Burkardt will miss Mainz's match against Hoffenheim due to an infection.

arts.ttl: Mainz set eye-watering price for Burkardt, Sky reports
arts.sum: Jonathan Burkardt could cost a pretty penny in summer as Mainz demand top dollar for their marksman.

arts.ttl: TSG Hoffenheim v Mainz preview: spirited 05ers aim three points in front of “home” support
arts.sum: TSG Hoffenheim will play yet another “away game” at home with 10,000 Mainz fans travelling for the PreZero clash.

arts.ttl: Official | Mainz sign trio to contract extensions
arts.sum: FSV Mainz 05 confirmed contract extensions for a trio of players on Friday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Kohr and Da Costa sign new deals at Mainz
arts.sum: In a busy day for Mainz officials, Bundesliga’s fourth-placed team extend three contracts.

arts.ttl: Mainz extend contract of understudy keeper
arts.sum: Daniel Batz will be part of Mainz 05’s next season adventure after signing a contract extension.

arts.ttl: Mainz will travel to Hoffenheim with 10,000 fans
arts.sum: A big boost for Bo Henriksen’s side ahead of their weekend trip to Hoffenheim with 10,000 Mainz fans expected at the PreZero Arena.
